HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"I can guarantee that #AmandaBlackburn 's murderers, ahem \"urban yoof,\" i.e. \"good boys who dindunuffin\" were on welfare, gov assistance."
"Marseille is approximately 40% Moslem, and is the most dangerous city in Europe. #Nothingtodowithislam @BristolComSense"
"If you have termites in your house, basic common sense says let them stay and just firebomb a termite colony across the street instead."
"#ParisAttacks are NOT an attack against all "humanity." They are against WESTERN civilization."
"@WaifuKaori @NononJakuzure18 @vicmandrake There's a reason why trannies are disgusting. Many reasons really."
"Since we're talking about #BlackOnCampus, let's just be honest & admit that most of the blacks on campus aren't qualified to be there"
"@2dAmMuslim ::as species dies:: let it be known that women are useless"
"Jews should know Every Single Thing about Islam is PEACE. Islam did not start any war, it was the JEWS for being greedy to the CORE."
"Being #BlackonCampus makes you eligible for financial aid that white students don't get #NationalOffendACollegeStudentDay"
"Raising the average IQ of Arabs will eliminate Islam faster than anything. Can be done with CRISPR."
